description: This file defines the Angular application configuration, setting up providers such as route configuration, zone change detection, and client hydration strategies.

methods.name: provideZoneChangeDetection
methods.description: Configures zone change detection strategy for Angular app.

methods.name: provideRouter
methods.description: Sets up routing with the specified routes.

methods.name: provideClientHydration
methods.description: Enables client-side hydration with optional event replay.

methods.name: withEventReplay
methods.description: Creates configuration for event replay during hydration.
